IHS4950 - Interdisciplinary Projects in.name: IHS4950 - Interdisciplinary Projects in Health Professions

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Identification, design, and implementation of innovative, needs-based health projects by interdisciplinary teams of students pursuing careers in the health professions.
